text: The Lycée Saint-Louis is a secondary school located in Paris. Founded in 1820 by the Raoul d'Harcourt as the Collège d'Harcourt,La vie universitaire à Paris sous la Restauration, de 1820 à 1830 it provides exclusively prepatory classes for grandes ecoles.Le Lycée Saint-louis : Des Classes Préparatoires Réputées ==Former student== * Raymond Aubrac, a French engineer and leader ==References== Category:19th-century establishments in France Category:1820s establishments in Europe Category:1820 establishments Category:Colleges and universities in France Category:Schools in Paris
title: Lycée Saint-Louis
